name: QUBO (itch)
description:
Qubo is a hard fast paced game, where you are a speeding cube that must avoid hitting against obstacles. There is currently 8 levels in the game, each one more difficult than the previous one. Qubo has an ability system where you gain abilities, that help you in various ways. You can unlock this abilities by levelling up and with in-game coins. A leader board is available so you can check how you doing. Get rewards by completing some achievements.  Yes, there is a total of 30 achievements that you can complete for rewards. And there is much more you can check in game.  Just have fun...

Find out more at www.Ixion-games.com

Disclaimer: Keep in mind that Qubo is the first game that i ever done. This is a project that made me learn unity3d and c#. I started 6 month ago watching tutorials about unity3d and eventually started to learn c#, this game is the product of that.
